overview: The short tells the story of a couple kidnapping the daughter of former judge "Célio Mauro", in exchange for the release of former president "Luiz Jararaca da Silva".  This is the synopsis on the original video: Operação Lula Livre is an apology for pacifism, civilization and democracy. The film criticizes, ridicules and repudiates the armed struggle if someone could not understand the obvious.
title: Operação Lula Livre
